verses.roman:
āra yata bhakta-gaṇa gauḍa-deśa-vāsī
pratyabde prabhure dekhe nīlācale āsi'

synonyms: āra—others; yata—all; bhakta-gaṇa—devotees; gauḍa-deśa-vāsī—residents of Bengal; prati-abde—each year; prabhure—the Lord; dekhe—see; nīlācale—in Jagannātha Purī; āsi'-coming there.
translation: All the devotees who resided in Bengal used to visit Jagannātha Purī every year to see the Lord.
